text_block_list.text: Eh? The reason I'm chasing after Maruzen-san?
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text:
Up until now, Sakura Chiyono O's driving motivation had been a 
mix of fear, of resignation, and of genuine admiration.

If she can remember those feelings… she should 
be able to escape this quagmire she's found herself 
in. I ask her about those feelings.

That's, um. 
Because she's faster, and stronger than anyone-
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: …She has, what I lack…
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text:
-Thinking back, every since I was small, I've been good at 
running, and I loved it… joining a club, racing, winning a lot.
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text:
My my, Chiyo-chan you've got alot of talent, don't you? 
Someday you're going to enroll at Tracen Academy, you say?
text_block_list.name: Relative

text_block_list.text:
Yeah! I'm going to become an amazing Uma Musume-! 
Everyday, I'm training at home with my big brother, too!
text_block_list.name: Young Chiyono O

text_block_list.text:
With the help of my outstanding brother, I was able to pass the 
best academy's entrance exams and leave moderate results. With 
pride I enrolled, but what awaited me was-
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text:
Hey, did you see the mock race that Mister CB was 
in?! When she pulled away at the end, that was super 
cool, I've never seen anything like that!
text_block_list.name: Classmate A

text_block_list.text:
Hey now, Oguri cap is really cool too! Seriously, 
it's like watching a prodigy running, that acceleration is crazy!
text_block_list.name: Classmate B

text_block_list.text: At Tracen Academy, I was just a normal, everyday, Uma Musume.
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: …well then, good work!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text:
Huh, Chiyo-chan? We don't have an instructor, 
so it sounds like there's no training today.
text_block_list.name: Classmate A

text_block_list.text: Ah, yeah! I thought I'd do some self training!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text:
Haaa, haaa, haaa…! 
…ku… taaaaaaaaa!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: No matter how much I ran, that feeling kept getting stronger.
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: Haaa, haaa, haaa!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text:
Yeah, for someone that just enrolled, not bad! There'll be some 
challenges, but let's work on clearing them one by one!
text_block_list.name: Instructor

text_block_list.text: (For someone who just enrolled, huh?)
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: …Instructor, what are my strong points?
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text:
Let's see. It's not flashy, but in the end your 
steadiness eventually wins out. You're earnest, 
so you've probably got a solid foundation.
text_block_list.name: Instructor

text_block_list.text: A steady, earnest, Uma Musume.
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: With that, is there anything I can become…?
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: What is it that I want to become here?
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: Then, one day. A fateful day
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text:
Maruzensky pulls farther and farther ahead! She increases the 
separation by 3 length, 4 lengths, - Strong, as expected!
text_block_list.name: Commentator

text_block_list.text: Fufuu, here I gooo!
text_block_list.name: Maruzensky

text_block_list.text: The one who was there -an absurdly vivid, "Super Car".
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: Ah, wa, wa, ah…!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text:
Someone who had everything I lacked, an Uma Musume dyed in red. 
It left a huge impact.
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text:
My excitement wouldn't subside, it couldn't be helped. 
Because of these heightened emotions, all those thoughts 
running through my head came together-
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text:
A steady, earnest Uma Musume -however. 
That's wrong, higher, I want to reach even higher…!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text:
Even if the training is difficult, even if I can't 
reach it, even if it takes a long time, I want 
to get faster, stronger, just like her-
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: I want to be like Maruzensky-san…!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: In an instant, the world became brilliant.
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: Thanks for the food!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text:
Spaghetti with, nata de coco and tiramisu…? 
…is this perhaps, a trend that's coming back in to fashion?
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text:
Eh? Ehe, ehehehe…! It's nothing like that, it's just, well the 
senpai I look up to eats this, so without thinking…
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text:
Well, when it comes to magazines featuring Maruzensky-san, 
these seem to be all of them.
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
Waa, there's a lot…! Thank you very much! 
Is it fine for me to borrow all of them?
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text:
Of course, that's fine but… Fufu. 
You really like Maruzen-san don't you?
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text: Eh? Ah… ehehe, Yes!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: Haa, haa…!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text:
(My time, is it a little too fast…? 
No, "If you don't run, the scenery will never change", right?!)
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text:
Alllright, from now on I'm going to work hard every morning! 
Chiyono Fight O-!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text:
…I see, that's right. 
I wanted to do everything I could to be by Maruzensky's side.
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text:
Even then, I forgot all of that, 
wondering what I should do from now on, thinking only about that-
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
choice_data_list: What do you want to do now?

text_block_list.text: Right now-
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: I want to fight…!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
